amendment.description: To provide for air quality in aircraft cabins.

vote.text: Amendment SA 917 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 917 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S7811-7812; text: CR S7811) To provide for air quality in aircraft cabins.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 917 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 917 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
